content: floral headband is knitted flat in stockinette stitch then floral motifs are embroidered the sides are joined together and finally the headband is sewn on top **sizes ** adjustable for all head circumferences includes written instructions for sizes from 2-year-old to adult sizes head circumferences 48 50 52 54 56 58 60 cm 19 00 19 75 20 50 21 25 22 00 22 75 23 50 in all measurements are approximate centimetres are rounded to the nearest 0 5 cm and inches to the nearest 0 25 **needles ** 5 0 mm us 8 circular needles or single point needles or any size to obtain gauge gauge 17 sts x 22 row = 10 x 10 cm 4 x 4 in using 5mm us 8 in stockinette stitch after blocking **yarn ** sport weight yarn 100 % alpaca held with lace weight silk-mohair yarn 75% mohair 25% silk shown examples are knitted with filcolana alpaca 167m/50gr 183 yd/1 76 oz in colours light blush 334 and slightly purple 369 held together with drops kid-silk 212m/25gr 232 yd/0 88 oz in colour light pink 03 **embroidery thread ** anchor tapestry wool or any other knitting yarn with clear twist and that is not too stretchy shown examples are embroidered in colours 8522 8582 and 9072 yarn requirements 75 75 75 75 100 100 100 m 82 82 82 82 109 109 109 yd embroidery thread requirements 5 m 5 5 yd of each colour **you will also need ** embroidery backing for motif transfer and embroidery sharp needle with large eye tapestry needle scissors frixion pilot pen follow me on instagram https //www instagram com/heklarije_i_to/
